entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity Api Endpoint Route Builder Extensions #58994
  • Range Attribute to specify a value inside an array max/min lengths #58993
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query #58992
  • Perf improvement: caching, json #58991
  • Errors after updating packages #58990
  • AddOpenIdConnect not properly parsing Token Claims from OIDC Providers #58989
  • Form Databinding Not working correctly with Nested object - Static SSR form submission #58988
  • MapStaticAssets doesn't work with WebApplication.CreateSlimBuilder #58986
  • When building the entire aspnetcore repo (i.e. inside the VMR) desktop msbuild is chosen #58985
  • -BuildManaged -BuildInstallers doesn't work as installer build too early #58984
  • Blazor Server "Error: Invocation canceled due to the underlying connection being closed" when trying to change base path #58981
  • 'IServiceCollection' does not contain a definition for 'AddIdentity' and no accessible extension method 'AddIdentity' #58979
  • Blazor web app with Fallback authentication and disabled prerendering doesn't load content of anonymous pages #58978
  • RendererInfo causes "SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input" #58977
  • Static Web Assets with Finger Printing in Razor Class Libraries not supported? #58976
  • MSB4018: The "DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly. #58975
  • [Razor class library (RCL)] Enable the automatic import of arbitrary CSS files into consumer project. #58974
  • Razor regression in ASP .NET Core 9.0 #58973
  • [Bug] Redis SignalR Backplane completely fails InteractiveServer components #58971
  • Generate a competent Project Lead model that will solve the naming and documentation issues. #58969
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI produces lots of duplicate schemas for the same object #58968

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #58941
  • Perf regression: mvc #58972
  • Dotnet 9.0 scaffolding no longer works - errors when doing NavigationManager.NavigateTo in Create.razor #58951
  • [Bug] .NET9 SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor cannot start app #58983
  • Screen reader is not announcing error when required "Title", "Genre" and "Rating" fields kept blank: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_ScreenReader #56284
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58961
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58883
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #58928
  • InteractiveServer SignalR Redis Backplane does not work #58078
  • .NET 9 - Blazor Web App - Global Server Rendering with Individual Accounts not working #58967
  • Using Blazor Web App template in dotnet 8. Upload component doesn't fire "onChange" event #58729
  • Issue: preventDefault Not Working in Blazor Interactive WebAssembly Events in .NET 8 #58718
  • Compile Fails in 2022 Preview but works in 2022 #58748

PullRequests

Created

  • Put package assets in TFM-specific folder #58995
    area-mvc
  • Build installers at the end of the repo build #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

Updated

  • Address variable initialization warnings in ANCM (C26494) #58904
    area-networking
  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update Weather.razor #58955
    area-mvc
